api_list.name: Farfetch search product
Farfetch lookup by Product ID
api_list.description: Get realtime product information by product_id from Farfetch

api_list.name: Farfetch categories
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://farfetch-data.p.rapidapi.com/category.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "farfetch-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://farfetch-data.p.rapidapi.com/category.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "farfetch-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
